alert.note: Alert for Sauk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 9:04PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Sauk County through 945 PM CDT... At 903 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Hillsboro, or 13 miles north of Richland Center, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Reedsburg, Lake Delton, Spring Green, West Baraboo, Plain, North Freedom, La Valle, Rock Springs, Loganville, Ironton, Lime Ridge, and Hill Point. This includes U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 213 and 218. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central Wisconsin.
